text.text_translated: Writing about your dreams will mean you start to remember more details about them, so think about the people and place where the dream happened, as they might add to its meaning too. Over the period of a week, you will be surprised by how much you have written. Then, you can start connecting your dreams to the events and feelings in your daily life.
